privacyText1: A shafin Sir Jimmy, muna daraja sirrin ku. Wannan gidan yanar gizo baya tattara bayanan sirri fiye da abin da kuka bayar (misali, lokacin da kuka tuntu…ìe mu ta imel ko WhatsApp).
privacyText2: Zai yiwu mu yi amfani da kukis da fasahohi makamancin haka don inganta amfani (kamar adana saitunan yanayin duhu ko tunawa da abubuwan da kuka fi so). Ba a sayar ko raba bayanan ku da wani …ìangare na uku.
privacyText3: Hanyoyin waje (misali WhatsApp, imel, GitHub) na iya kai ku zuwa wasu shafuka da ba mu da iko da su. Muna ∆ôarfafa ku duba manufofinsu daban.
privacyText4: Ta amfani da wannan shafin, kun yarda da amfani da kukis da sarrafa bayanan da ba na sirri ba don ∆ôara inganta kwarewar ku.
termsText1: Barka da zuwa shafin Sir Jimmy. Ta amfani da wannan gidan yanar gizo, kun yarda da wa…óannan sharu…ó…óan:
termsList1: Abubuwan da aka bayar suna don bayani da nuni kawai.
termsList2: Fasali kamar yanayin duhu, kunna ki…óa, da widget suna zuwa kamar yadda suke ba tare da garanti ba.
termsList3: Ba mu da alhakin matsalolin da suka taso daga hanyoyin waje (misali WhatsApp, imel, GitHub).
termsList4: Kun yarda da kada ku yi amfani da wannan shafin ta hanyar da bata dace ba ko kawo cikas ga aiki.
termsText2: Muna da ikon sabunta wa…óannan sharu…ó…óa a kowane lokaci. Ci gaba da amfani da shafin bayan canje-canje na nufin kun amince.
heroDescription: Mai ha…ìaka cikakken tsarin (Full-stack developer) wanda ke ∆ôir∆ôirar ∆ôa‚Äôidoji masu tsafta, amsawa da inganci. Ina juya ra‚Äôayoyi zuwa kayayyakin aiki.
contactSubtitle: Mu gina abu mai kyau tare
getInTouchText: Zan so jin ra‚Äôayinka ko aikin da kake da shi. Ko kana so ka fara sabon aiki, inganta app …óinka, ko kawai ka ce sannu ‚Äî ka iya tuntu…ìar mu.
messagePlaceholderProject: Ka fa…óa mani game da aikin ka...
fileNote: üìé Za ka iya ha…óa fayiloli kai tsaye a WhatsApp bayan an bu…óe tattaunawa.
aboutLead: Ni ne Sir Jimmy ‚Äî mai ha…ìaka wanda yake son gina hanyoyin amfani masu tsabta da ingantattu. Daga aikace-aikacen yanar gizo cikakku zuwa ayyukan da ke amfani da ML, burina shine samar da ∆ôima.
aboutText: Fasahohi da nake jin da…ói: Next.js, Flask, MongoDB, TensorFlow/Keras, da Streamlit. Hakanan ina jin da…óin amfani da Bootstrap da CSS na musamman don kyakkyawan, amintaccen UI.
faq1Q: Ta yaya zan iya tuntubar ka kai tsaye?
faq1A: Za ka iya tuntubar ni ta imel a
faq1Or: ko kuma ka kira ni kai tsaye a
faq2A: Ina bayar da ayyuka daban-daban ciki har da Full-Stack Development, UI/UX Design, Data Science, da DevOps. Burina shi ne gina mafita masu hankali, masu auna girma, kuma masu sau∆ôin amfani. Duba
faq3Q: Kana yin aiki kai ka…óai ko da tawaga?
faq3A: Ina yin aiki tare da ∆ôwararrun mutane ciki har da masu ha…ìaka, masu zanen UI, masu binciken bayanai, da masu tsara tsarin. Kowanne yana kawo ∆ôwarewa ta musamman don samun sakamako mafi kyau. Ka sadu da su a
faq4Q: Zan iya ganin misalan ayyukanka na baya?
faq4A: Tabbas! Na yi aiki akan ayyuka masu ban sha‚Äôawa daga aikace-aikacen yanar gizo zuwa mafita masu amfani da AI. Ziyarci
faq5Q: Yaushe zamu iya fara aiki tare?
faq5A: Ina koyaushe a bude ga sababbin damar! Lokacin yana dogara da girman aikin ka. Aika min da sa∆ôo ta
faqSubtitle: Ga wasu amsoshi ga tambayoyinku a ∆ôasa
servicesSubtitle: Kayan aiki da mafita da zan iya bayarwa

servicesList.title: Aikace-aikacen Yanar Gizo na Cikakken Tsari
servicesList.description: Daga tunani zuwa sakawa ‚Äî aikace-aikacen da suke da sauri, amintattu kuma masu amsawa.

servicesList.title: Tsarin Bayanai & ML
servicesList.description: Juya bayanai zuwa fahimta da sauri tare da gwaje-gwaje da dashboards.

servicesList.title: APIs & Hada-hadu
servicesList.description: REST APIs masu ∆ôarfi da ha…óa …ìangare na uku masu aiki yadda ya kamata.

projectsSubtitle: ∆òaramin za…ìi daga ayyukan da na yi kwanan nan

projectsList.title: Tsarin Samun Sakamako Mai Hikima
projectsList.short: Na‚Äôurar rarraba takardun sakamako ta lambar …óalibi & za…ìen faculty.
projectsList.description: Manhajar Flask da aka ha…óa da kayan aiki tana aiki akan Raspberry Pi don sarrafa injin servo wajen rarraba takardun sakamako. Tana ∆ôunshe da bincike ta lambar …óalibi, za…ìen faculty, da tsaron shiga.

projectsList.title: Gano Labaran ∆òarya (WELFake)
projectsList.short: Yana bambance labarai gaskiya ko ∆ôarya daga bayanan WELFake (~72k labarai).
projectsList.description: An gina tsarin rarrabuwa na rubutu (tsabtacewa, tokenization, LSTM/BERT) don gano labaran ∆ôarya. Ya ha…óa da dashboard mai bayyana sakamako.

projectsList.title: Gano Ji a Muryar Hausa
projectsList.short: Yana gano motsin zuciya daga sautunan Hausa ta amfani da MFCCs da LSTM.
projectsList.description: An gina rumbun bayanai da kuma LSTM don gane motsin zuciya daga sautunan Hausa. Ya ha…óa da demo inda za ka iya …óora sauti kuma ka sami hasashen.

projectsList.title: Mai Cire Imel Mai Hikima
projectsList.short: Mai binciken yanar gizo na halal da ke cire da kuma tantance imel daga shafuka.
projectsList.description: Crawler mai daidaici da amfani da tsarin NLP don gano adireshin imel cikin sau∆ôi tare da rage kuskure. Ya ha…óa da tabbaci da fitarwa zuwa CSV.

projectsList.title: Dandalin Rabon Lambar Kwamfuta
projectsList.short: Rabo na lambar kwamfuta tare da rajista, posts, likes, da comments.
projectsList.description: Dandalin sau∆ôi inda masu amfani za su iya raba snippets, yin like, da tattaunawa. Tsarin UI mai kyau, yana aiki a kowane na‚Äôura, tare da dark/light mode.

projectsList.title: Gano Cutar Wake (Soybean)
projectsList.short: Yana gano cututtukan ganyen wake ta hanyar bayanai (~770 hotuna).
projectsList.description: An gina da gwada samfurin CNN don gane cututtukan tsirrai. Ya ha…óa da hoton Grad-CAM don bayyana hasashen.
